member.name: M:Speedy.Application.Wpf.Extensions.DeviceIdExtensions.AddMacAddressFromMmi(Speedy.Application.DeviceId,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the MAC address to the device identifier, optionally excluding wireless adapters and/or non-physical adapters.
member.param: A value indicating whether wireless adapters should be excluded.
A value indicating whether non-physical adapters should be excluded.

member.name: M:Speedy.Application.Wpf.Extensions.DeviceIdExtensions.AddMachineGuid(Speedy.Application.DeviceId)
member.summary: Adds the Machine GUID (from HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Cryptography\MachineGuid) to the device identifier.

member.summary: Adds the motherboard serial number to the device identifier.

member.name: T:Speedy.Application.Wpf.Internal.MmiMacAddressDeviceIdComponent
member.summary: An implementation of that uses the MAC Address of the PC. This improves upon the basic by using MMI to get better information from either MSFT_NetAdapter or Win32_NetworkAdapter.

member.summary: A value determining whether non-physical devices should be excluded.

member.summary: A value determining whether wireless devices should be excluded.

A value determining whether non-physical devices should be excluded.
